meaningMnemonic: The <radical>call</radical> radical and the <kanji>call</kanji> kanji are the same. This kanji can also mean <kanji>eat</kanji>, because why would you call someone if not to ask them to eat with you?!
readingMnemonic: You are <kanji>call</kanji>ed to come <kanji>eat</kanji> by the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). He's been really impressed with you lately and he wants to chat over drinks, he says on the phone.
